channel.title: How do you turn invisible and hide crown ingame?
channel.description: i need to know how ppl turn invisible without disquise and how they hide mod/admin crown so ppl cant tell they mod/admin

item.title: How do you turn invisible and hide crown ingame?
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

ok can u do it for me i want the magical lyre to teleport me ( make it go anywhere ill change it later) please thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 11:13:00 PM[/size][hr]ooops sorry about that last post i was doing two posts at once and got them mixed anyway the command is ::hide it mucks up the name of the staff and makes them completely invisible right? it is on most servers and the reverse to show your character and make them normal again is ::show

here is the code for both show and hide in case you dont have it(put it in client.java with the commands):

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mjstar")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mjstar")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do you turn invisible and hide crown ingame?
